body:
can anyone help me with my internet problems? I've called my ISP so many times and nothing happens, still the same. It's fast for 2 minutes then goes really slow (690 ms in game) then just cuts out all together, when finished it is back to fast for 2 minutes then gets slow again.

Any fixes would be great!

title: internet issues

replies.body: if you have Telstra, I would throw the internet modem out of the window, and get some shit that is better
